SELECT work_id, work_name, page_id, page_name, case_name, block_cre_user, u.nickname, display_id, content, display_cre_date, display_up_date FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM view_wk_search) MINUS (SELECT * FROM view_wk_search WHERE page_cre_user != #{logUser} AND public_check = 'P_PRIV')) JOIN tbl_user u ON (u.email = block_cre_user) WHERE (work_id in (SELECT work_id FROM tbl_member WHERE email = #{logUser}))
AND content LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND (case WHEN display_up_date IS NULL then display_cre_date ELSE display_up_date end) between TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'rrrr-MM-dd') AND TO_DATE(#{startDate}, 'rrrr-MM-dd') TO_DATE(#{endDate}, 'rrrr-MM-dd')
ORDER BY display_cre_date desc

SELECT work_id, work_name, page_id, page_name, case_name, parent_id, parent_name FROM (SELECT * FROM (SELECT * FROM view_db_search) MINUS (SELECT * FROM view_db_search WHERE page_cre_user != #{logUser} AND public_check = 'P_PRIV')) WHERE (work_id in (SELECT work_id FROM tbl_member WHERE email = #{logUser}))
page_name LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' work_name LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' case_name LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
ORDER BY cre_date desc
